message.body: I sent these pics to Peter an hour ago but he didn't respond. Which do you like for Bens coat? They are at I Goldberg, I'd like to leave center city with something so I don't have to come back up here. I like that last one best.￼￼￼￼

While I'm impressed that you are still doggedly pursuing Ben's coat, I think that it's probably okay to let it go. There was a development earlier today. You can also not worry about the pamphlets. We'll get back to you tonight.
Peter just got back to me a min ago and said get the bottom one, can you touch base with him ASAP before I purchase it?
I can't get a fucking answer. If its returnable, buy it, I guess, but I really don't see us using it. It supposed to be 70 on Monday. You can always return it.
Well. I'm saying no. Save the money. We can always go back.
